description: A helper may require a number of parameters to actually be helpful. The parameters used by the helper can be stored in this field, as an object. E.g when using Basic Authentication, the username and password will be stored here.

oneOf.title: API Key Authentication
oneOf.description: The attributes for API Key Authentication. e.g. key, value, in.

id.description: This field contains the type of the helper. In this case, it is ``apikey``

oneOf.title: AWS Signature v4
oneOf.description: The attributes for [AWS Auth](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/RESTAuthentication.html). e.g. accessKey, secretKey, region, service.

id.description: This field contains the type of the helper. In this case, it is ``awsSigV4``

oneOf.title: Digest Authentication
oneOf.description: The attributes for [Digest Authentication](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digest_access_authentication). e.g. username, password, realm, nonce, nonceCount, algorithm, qop, opaque, clientNonce.

id.description: This field contains the type of the helper. In this case, it is ``digest``

oneOf.title: EdgeGrid Authentication
oneOf.description: The attributes for [Akamai EdgeGrid Authentication](https://developer.akamai.com/legacy/introduction/Client_Auth.html). e.g. accessToken, clientToken, clientSecret, baseURL, nonce, timestamp, headersToSign.

id.description: This field contains the type of the helper. In this case, it is ``edgegrid``

oneOf.title: Hawk Authentication
oneOf.description: The attributes for [Hawk Authentication](https://github.com/hueniverse/hawk). e.g. authId, authKey, algorith, user, nonce, extraData, appId, delegation, timestamp.

id.description: This field contains the type of the Postman helper. In this case, it is ``hawk``

oneOf.title: NTLM Authentication
oneOf.description: The attributes for [NTLM Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc237488.aspx). e.g. username, password, domain, workstation.

id.description: This field contains the type of the helper. In this case, it is ``ntlm``

oneOf.title: Basic Authentication
oneOf.description: The attributes for [Basic Authentication](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic_access_authentication). e.g. username, password.

id.description: This field contains the type of the helper. In this case, it is ``basic``

oneOf.title: Bearer Token Authentication
oneOf.description: The attributes for [Bearer Token Authentication](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6750). e.g. token.

id.description: This field contains the type of the helper. In this case, it is ``bearer``

oneOf.title: OAuth1
oneOf.description: The attributes for [OAuth1](https://oauth.net/1/). e.g. consumerKey, consumerSecret, token, tokenSecret, signatureMethod, timestamp, nonce, version, realm, encodeOAuthSign.

id.description: This field contains the type of the helper. In this case, it is ``oAuth1``

oneOf.title: OAuth2
oneOf.description: The attributes for [OAuth2](https://oauth.net/2/). e.g. accessToken, addTokenTo.

id.description: This field contains the type of the helper. In this case, it is ``oAuth2``
